Name: Poison
Description: Inflicts damage over time every turn.

Name: Paralysis
Description: Reduces speed and has a chance to prevent movement.

Name: Sleep
Description: Puts the target to sleep, preventing actions for 1-3 turns.

Name: Burn
Description: Inflicts damage over time and halves physical strength.

Name: Confusion
Description: The target has a 50% chance to hurt itself instead of attacking.
